select pk_id as id, gmt_create as createTime, gmt_modified as modifiedTime, title, content, is_anonymous as isAnonymous, user_id as userId,answerCount from question left outer join ((select question_id as pk_id, count(*) as answerCount from answer group by question_id) as A) using(pk_id) order by answerCount desc
mapper.update: update question set gmt_create=#{createTime}, gmt_modified=#{modifiedTime}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, is_anonymous=#{isAnonymous}, user_id=#{userId} where pk_id = #{id}
